import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "./contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const [isSubmit, setIsSubmit] = useState(true); const submitForm = () => { isSubmit ? setIsSubmit(true) (

Thankyou for contacting us.

We are connecting to you soon.

) : (

); }; return (

CONTACT

); }; export default Contact;
